translation.en: Oh, bollocks.
We've got a problem.
-A cyber attack? -Yes, Prime Minister.
translation.ja: サイバー攻撃？ はい 首相

translation.en: Took me two bottles of wine and half a packet of sleeping pills to finally nod off.
translation.ja: ワインのボトル２本と 睡眠薬で ようやく寝たのに⸺

translation.en: And you wake me because some fat-fingered hacker's pinched your PIN number?
translation.ja: あなたの暗証番号が 盗まれたぐらいで何？

translation.en: Well, it's a little more serious than that, Prime Minister.
The identities of every one of our serving agents have been exposed.
translation.ja: 全エージェントの⸺ 情報が漏洩(ろうえい)した

translation.en: -Who's doing this? -We're not sure, Ma'am.
So one week before I host my first G12 Summit, Britain's entire security apparatus has been taken down
translation.ja: 私が初ホストをするＧ12の １週間前にシステム侵害で⸺

translation.en: and you know absolutely nothing?
That does pretty much sum up the situation, Ma'am, yes.
Well, you better get someone on it and find me some answers!
Yes, but that's the problem. We don't have any agents left. They've all been outed.
translation.ja: 引退したエージェントしか いません

translation.en: So bring back an old one!
All units, this is Juliet Echo. Stand by for target coordinates.
translation.ja: こちらＪ･Ｅ 確保に備えて待機せよ

translation.en: Target acquired. Repeat, target acquired.
translation.ja: 標的接近 繰り返す　標的接近

translation.en: Now then, what have we here?
translation.ja: さてと　何が掛かったかな？

translation.en: Sorry, sir.
Never mind, Baggaley.
translation.ja: 気にするな　バガリー

translation.en: Your concealment and camouflage work is definitely improving.
translation.ja: 気にするな　バガリー 擬態術(カムフラージュ)は上達したぞ

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
[boy] Come on.
You, too, Ibadulla.
Excellent. That is a first-class man-trap.
translation.ja: お見事 今のワナは一級品だ

translation.en: -Six house points. -Yes!
translation.ja: ６点 あげよう やった！

translation.en: Right, let's get back to school before Matron notices you're missing. [all] Aw.
translation.ja: 学校へ戻ろう 寮母さんが気づく

translation.en: And don't worry, there aren't any more booby traps.
translation.ja: もう落とし穴はないよ

translation.en: Apart from this one, of course.
Mr. English?
We haven't seen him, sir.
And that's camouflage.
translation.ja: これがカムフラージュ

translation.en: And go.
And go.
And go.
The welfare of your children is our paramount concern.
translation.ja: 我が校は生徒の安全が第一

translation.en: They're never exposed to any unnecessary risk, I assure you.
translation.ja: 危険なことは させません

translation.en: I think that's an "F" for your bomb-disposal coursework, Hattersley.
translation.ja: 残念だが爆弾処理の 科目は落第だな

translation.en: "You're looking particularly beautiful tonight."
translation.ja: 今夜は特に お美しい

translation.en: [all] You're looking particularly beautiful tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜は特に お美しい

translation.en: "Ching!"
[all] Ching!
-Have a good half-term, sir! -Thank you.
[all] Thank you, sir.
Are you seriously telling me this is all we've got?
Most of them are either dead, having hip operations or recovering from prostate surgery.
translation.ja: あとは死んだか 前立腺の手術の直後で

translation.en: Okay.
Before your briefing, we'll need you to re-sign the Official Secrets Act.
translation.ja: まず秘密保持の書類に サインを

translation.en: Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you very much.
[Agent Seven] Any of you gentlemen remember this?
Oh, the Mont Blanc Blaster. Haven't seen one of those for years.
translation.ja: モンブラン弾か 最近は見ないな

translation.en: Take the cap off and, if memory serves, you've 20 seconds to replace it
translation.ja: キャップを取って 20秒以内に戻さなければ⸺

translation.en: or it detonates with the force of a stun grenade.
translation.ja: 催眠弾が炸裂(さくれつ)する

translation.en: Thank you.
Teas on the left, gentlemen.
And coffees on the right.
[Agent Seven] Excellent.
Oh, damn it, I forgot my pills.
translation.ja: しまった　薬を忘れた

translation.en: [Agent Nine] Here, have some of mine.
[Agent Seven] Scotch whisky, single malt?
Coffee.
Here, let me help you with that.
Tea?
This one just needs a little top-up of hot water.
translation.ja: 少し お湯を足さないと

translation.en: I'll be right back.
[Agent Seven] Man's a divot of the first order. Someone should put him out of his misery.
translation.ja: マヌケな男だ 安楽死でもさせるといい

translation.en: [Agent Nine] Along with whoever -furnished this room. -Oh. [gasps]
Ah! Good morning. Sorry to keep you. [clears throat]
translation.ja: おはよう　お待たせした

translation.en: Are the others here?
They, um... They nodded off.
translation.ja: どうやら⸺ 居眠りを

translation.en: Right...
And who are you, exactly?
English. -Johnny English. -[Pegasus] Well...
translation.ja: イングリッシュ ジョニー･イングリッシュです

translation.en: You'll leave immediately.
translation.ja: すぐ出発だ 詳細は道中で話す

translation.en: My people will give you the full briefing en route. Is there anything you need?
translation.ja: すぐ出発だ 詳細は道中で話す 必要なものは？

translation.en: Yes, nerve gas nasal spray, a type-four exoskeleton...
translation.ja: 鼻スプレー型神経ガス パワードスーツ…

translation.en: You should probably start a list.
And a garroting watch, with the rubber strap, not the steel bracelet
translation.ja: 絞殺用腕時計 ベルトはゴム製

translation.en: because the links get caught in the little hairs on my wrist.
translation.ja: 金属だと毛が挟まるからね

translation.en: Oh, and I'll also need a Bough.
What's a "Bough"?
Sir!
Wonderful to see you!
Yes, all right, Bough. We're going on a mission, not a honeymoon.
translation.ja: 任務だぞ ハネムーンじゃない

translation.en: Yes, of course, sir.
I think it's the pin of your buckle, sir. It's caught on my jumper.
translation.ja: バックルに引っかかった

translation.en: [English] Yes, I can see what's wrong, Bough.
If you go to your left and I'll go to my right.
translation.ja: 君は左へ動いて　私は右だ

translation.en: I'm sorry, no, if you go to your right and I'll go to my left.
translation.ja: 違った　君が右で私は左

translation.en: No. If I go clockwise and you go anti-clockwise...
translation.ja: いや 私が時計回りで君は逆

translation.en: -No, I think that's making it worse, sir. -Hmm. I'm surprised that didn't work.
translation.ja: 余計 伸びました おかしいな

translation.en: Good morning, sir. I have your agent activation pack here.
translation.ja: ようこそ 支給ツールです

translation.en: Department-issue smartphone.
580-megapixel camera, 4.7-inch retina HD display.
translation.ja: 580メガピクセルのカメラ レティーナＨＤディスプレイ

translation.en: Ingenious. And what does it shoot? Poison darts?
translation.ja: すばらしい 何を発射する？　毒矢か？

translation.en: It doesn't shoot anything. It's a phone.
translation.ja: 何も発射しません 電話ですから

translation.en: There's a Twitter handle, Instagram feed and secure login for the department Uber account.
translation.ja: ツイッター　インスタグラム ウーバーは設定済み

translation.en: What's he on about, Bough? I need a weapon. Not a box of gobbledygook.
translation.ja: 何のことだ？ 私は武器が欲しい

translation.en: I think what Agent English is getting at, sir, is all this is highly trackable.
translation.ja: スマホは追跡されやすい という意味です

translation.en: But since we're dealing with a very sophisticated, digital target,
translation.ja: ＩＴを駆使する 相手だからこそ⸺

translation.en: we might be less visible if we took a more analog, low-tech approach.
translation.ja: アナログで対抗した方が 発見されにくい

translation.en: Exactly.
I see.
Is there anything else I can get you?
A gun.
We don't really do guns anymore.
translation.ja: 銃は⸺ もう支給していません

translation.en: Just get him a gun.
[P] Right, a gun.
Right. Haven't actually done one of these before.
translation.ja: これを出すのは初めてです

translation.en: "It is my obligation under section 14 of the Health and Safety Directive to inform you
translation.ja: “安全規則 第14条”に 基づき伝える

translation.en: that the equipment with which you are about to be issued can cause injury and bodily harm.
translation.ja: 支給される装備は あなたに 害を及ぼすことがある

translation.en: Furthermore, any agents with nut allergies should be aware that traces of cashew oil--"
translation.ja: ナッツ･アレルギーを 持つ者は注意を…

translation.en: Thank you.
Right, transport.
So, take any hybrid you want.
translation.ja: 好きなハイブリッドを

translation.en: I'll take this one.
Oh, don't be ridiculous, English. This car is a relic.
translation.ja: バカな　これは過去の遺物だ

translation.en: Drinks petrol, leaks oil and has no passive, let alone active safety features.
translation.ja: 燃費は悪い　オイルは漏れる 安全装置もない

translation.en: [Bough] Do you know what else it doesn't have, sir?
Satellite navigation or a single computer chip.
Making it completely invisible to a digital enemy.
translation.ja: つまり敵には見えざる相手

translation.en: The equipment Agent English requested, sir.
translation.ja: リクエストの装備です

translation.en: Thank you.
-Phone, Bough? -Yeah.
That hi-tech villain of yours will never see us coming.
translation.ja: ハイテクな敵に探知されない

translation.en: [Bough] Let's see what they've given us.
Exoskeleton, exploding cotton buds, the old shoebox inflatable.
translation.ja: パワードスーツ　綿棒爆弾 瞬間ゴムボート

translation.en: -Oh. What are these? -Instant-Release Super High-Energy Pills.
translation.ja: 緑のは？ 超速効のスーパー精力剤 爆発的にパワーが出る

translation.en: Like sticking your fingers in an electric socket. Highly recommended.
translation.ja: 超速効のスーパー精力剤 爆発的にパワーが出る 超オススメ

translation.en: Right, so, the red ones must be the Total Knockout Sleeping Pills.
-Correct. -Huh.
Probably worth labeling these. Oh!
[chuckles] Look, sir. Sweeties.
[English] Hang on a minute.
I always did love a jelly baby.
translation.ja: このゼリー 大好物

translation.en: I wouldn't if I was you, Bough. "Jelly" is short for "gelignite."
translation.ja: 待て　ゼリーは ゼリグナイトの略称

translation.en: One bite and it'll take the top of your head off along with the roof of the car.
translation.ja: ひと噛みで頭が吹っ飛ぶ

translation.en: So, what does this do?
It's a mixtape, Bough.
-[English] So, destination? -[Bough] South of France, sir.
translation.ja: 目的地は？ 南フランス

translation.en: That cyber attack seems to have been launched from the Wi-Fi signal of a hotel in Antibes.
translation.ja: 攻撃元はアンティーブの ホテルらしい

translation.en: Sir? Sir, I've just had a fax through from HQ.
translation.ja: ボス　本部からファックスが

translation.en: Background checks on all the guests that accessed the Wi-Fi network.
translation.ja: Wi-Fiを使った客の情報です

translation.en: See? Who needs email?
translation.ja: ほら メールなど要らん

translation.en: Um... One name has raised a red flag, sir.
Sebastian Lynch, ex-Army and Military Intelligence.
translation.ja: Ｓ･リンチ 軍情報部の出身

translation.en: Now selling his services to the highest bidder.
translation.ja: 今は高級な情報屋です

translation.en: -Where do we find him? -Directly ahead, sir.
translation.ja: どこにいる？ あそこに

translation.en: [Bough] He's got an eight o'clock reservation at the Cote de Roc restaurant.
translation.ja: レストランを８時に予約

translation.en: The problem's going to be getting close enough for a full surveillance, sir.
translation.ja: 観察するには近づかないと

translation.en: Not necessarily.
Simple plan, two parts. You provide the distraction, I'll get the phone.
translation.ja: シンプルにいく 君は気をそらし 私は携帯を

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -And from now on...
translation.ja: 了解 今からフランス訛(なま)りの ウェイターを装うこと

translation.en: [in French accent] Perhaps we should sound like French waiters.
translation.ja: 今からフランス訛(なま)りの ウェイターを装うこと

translation.en: [in French accent] French waiters?
Yees.
[in normal accent] Go on.
Are you finished now, Sebastian?
Bread roll?
Yes, thank you.
[Bough] Excellent choice, madame.
[in French accent] Good evening.
How are you?
Bread roll, sir?
Yes. Thank you.
Excuse me, would you mind?
translation.ja: ちょっと いいかな

translation.en: Yes. Evening.
[Sebastian] Where's my phone?
[woman] That is your phone.
Thank you.
Monsieur.
The shell on my wife's lobster, could you remove it, please?
translation.ja: 殻をむいてくれないか

translation.en: Yees.
Let me crack it for you.
Sebastian, don't get involved.
There we are.
Voilà.
Hmm. Bon appétit.
[man] I will talk to the manager. I will talk to the manager.
translation.ja: 支配人に言おう ひどすぎる

translation.en: [English] Textbook, Bough.
[Bough] Just holiday snaps, sir.
Wait a minute. This photo...
It was taken the same day our villain accessed the Wi-Fi, and look.
translation.ja: サイバー攻撃と同じ日だ

translation.en: Scarcely 50 feet from shore.
Whoever was on that yacht could easily have used the hotel's Wi-Fi,
translation.ja: 犯人は船の上から ホテルのWi-Fiを使い⸺

translation.en: sent that signal, and then just sailed away.
translation.ja: 攻撃信号を送って船で去った

translation.en: I think it's time we paid the Dot Calm a visit.
translation.ja: 行ってみよう このドット･カーム号に

translation.en: [Jason] Algorithms.
translation.ja: 生活のキーは⸺ ロンドン 生活のキーは⸺

translation.en: We are surrounded by them.
Algorithms run our lives,
choose our TV shows, stream our music... even find us a date.
translation.ja: テレビ番組や音楽を選ぶ デートの相手も

translation.en: I know this chap, don't I?
Yes, he's that Silicon Valley billionaire who dated a Kardashian.
translation.ja: ＩＴ長者で カーダシアンの元カレ

translation.en: Two Kardashians, and a Black-Eyed Pea. Keep watching.
translation.ja: 姉妹両方のね　見て

translation.en: But supposing there was an algorithm for an entire country.
translation.ja: もし１つのアルゴリズムで⸺

translation.en: A single algorithm that could be applied to every one of its problems.
translation.ja: 国の問題が 解決できるとしたら？

translation.en: A single algorithm that could take a second-rate nation and make it...
translation.ja: もし それで途上国が 飛躍できるとしたら？

translation.en: world class.
Every nation is awash with data.
translation.ja: どの国もビッグデータを⸺

translation.en: So now, more than ever, we need to put that data to work, for the people.
translation.ja: もっと国民のために 活用すべき時代です

translation.en: These few lines of code will deliver the kind of change they have been dreaming of their entire lives.
translation.ja: わずか数行のコードで 人々の夢が叶うのです

translation.en: I am Xander. I love data.
translation.ja: 私はXander(ザンダー)　データが大好き

translation.en: He's so clever.
He's young, he's sexy, he's insanely successful.
translation.ja: 若くてセクシーな超成功者

translation.en: Just the qualities we need people to associate with me!
translation.ja: 私と交流すべきタイプよ

translation.en: Yes, Prime Minister.
And they will do, when he starts working with us.
But why would a Silicon Valley billionaire work with us?
Just get him into Number 10 and let me work on him.
translation.ja: 彼を官邸へ呼んで 会って話す

translation.en: -Yes, Ma'am. -Go on.
Oh, God, now what?
There's been another attack, Prime Minister. -[groans] -Air Traffic Control.
Someone's rerouted every flight in Europe to Luton.
translation.ja: 欧州の全便がルートン空港へ

translation.en: For God's sake, tell me the agent you've got in the field is making some progress?
translation.ja: 派遣したエージェントは 何か つかんだの？

translation.en: [Bough] So, how are we gonna find the location of that yacht, sir?
translation.ja: どうやって船の場所を？

translation.en: [English] Very easily, Bough. We ring MI7.
translation.ja: 簡単さ　ＭＩ-７に 電話して聞く

translation.en: Hello... hello? Yes, I need the location of a boat called...
translation.ja: もしもし？ 船の場所を知りた…

translation.en: Hello? Hello, yes. A boat called the Dot Calm.
translation.ja: もしもし？ 名前はドット･カーム号

translation.en: Yes, it's a play on words. Yeah.
-Where? -[line beeping]
[Bough] Looks about half a mile out, sir.
Do we wanna try and swim it, or...
No, Bough. This is a job for the shoebox inflatable.
translation.ja: いや 瞬間ゴムボートの 出番だ

translation.en: No, don't open it in the car, sir!
[muffled] Can you reach your door handle?
translation.ja: ドアのハンドルに 手は届くか？

translation.en: [muffled] No, sir.
I'll try my side.
Right, Bough, our aim is to get on board without anyone noticing.
translation.ja: いいか　誰にも 気づかれずに乗船する

translation.en: And how are we gonna do it?
-Magnetic boots. -Brilliant, sir.
translation.ja: 磁気ブーツ すばらしい

translation.en: Simple mechanism. Left switch activates left boot. Right switch activates right.
translation.ja: 簡単だ　左ボタンで左が動き 右ボタンで右が

translation.en: Okay, let's go.
Remember, the absolutely vital element of this mission is surprise.
translation.ja: よく聞け　このミッションの 必須要素は⸺ サプライズだ

translation.en: Yeah, you have to get up pretty early in the morning to outwit British Intelligence.
translation.ja: 英国のエージェントは 失敗知らずさ

translation.en: Quick!
[woman] Good evening, gentlemen.
Shall we start with your names?
Clearly you have no idea who you're dealing with.
translation.ja: 私が誰か知らんだろうな

translation.en: That's why I'm starting with your names.
Actually, would you mind coming down here? It's really hard to have a conversation like this.
translation.ja: 下りてこないか この姿勢 キツくて

translation.en: I have a better idea.
It's no good, it won't move, sir.
We'll see about that. Low-intensity exploding cotton bud.
translation.ja: これを使おう 低威力の綿棒爆弾だ

translation.en: That's quite a powerful charge for such a small space, sir.
Oh, nonsense.
There will just be a slight pop.
[whispering] Shall we locate the hold and look for the source of that signal?
[shouting] I think we should locate the hold and look for the source of that signal!
translation.ja: サイバー攻撃の 発信源を探るんだ！

translation.en: -Come on! -[shushes]
[shouting] I'd say we have our villain, Bough!
[whispering] Shh. You need to keep your voice down, sir.
[softly] And we're not going to lose him.
translation.ja: しっかりマークしよう

translation.en: Hand me the Sherbet Fountain.
Three sucks, and the location transmitter is activated.
translation.ja: ３回 吸うと 位置送信機が作動

translation.en: This gin palace will show up as a hostile from 30,000 feet.
translation.ja: この船は９キロ先から 探知できる

translation.en: This is now an enemy target.
translation.ja: これで船は標的になった

translation.en: Aniseed balls.
If you'd wanted to kill me, you would have already done so.
translation.ja: 本気なら とっくに殺してたろ？

translation.en: Till we meet again.
Well, that was sooner than I expected.
[Bough] Who do you think she is, sir?
[English] Well, if she's not the owner of that yacht, then she knows who is.
translation.ja: もし船主でなければ 船主を知る人物

translation.en: Either way, she's the key to this case.
translation.ja: どのみち事件のカギだ

translation.en: Is it true you were teaching, sir? Before all this blew up?
translation.ja: 学校で教えてたって 本当ですか？

translation.en: If by "teaching," you mean
scouting for potential intelligence operatives, then... yes, I was.
translation.ja: エージェントとして有望な子を 発掘することなら そうだよ

translation.en: I actually got married, sir. I don't know if you heard.
translation.ja: 僕は結婚しました ご存じで？

translation.en: No.
Yeah, Lydia.
Lovely girl.
You never think about getting hitched yourself, sir?
This is no life for a married man, Bough. The danger, the constant travel.
translation.ja: こんな仕事ではね 危険だし 旅も多い

translation.en: More Lydia's life than mine, sir.
She's in the Navy, you see.
What, as a cook?
Or some kind of seagoing secretary or...
translation.ja: それとも航海の秘書とか？

translation.en: Oh, no, sir. She's the captain of a nuclear submarine.
translation.ja: 原子力潜水艦の艦長です

translation.en: -Oh, right. -Hmm.
Do you think we should get some petrol for the Aston, sir?
No. An Aston Martin is surprisingly economical, Bough.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　驚くほど低燃費さ

translation.en: Besides, it looks like we're in business.
translation.ja: それに⸺ お客のようだぞ

translation.en: Come on.
[Bough] Looks like an electric car, sir.
Yes, and sounds like a nose-hair trimmer.
A bunch of triple-A batteries is no match for old-fashioned British horsepower.
translation.ja: 単４電池が旧型車の馬力に かなうもんか

translation.en: I'm listening.
They've taken the bait.
-Keep me updated. -Okay.
translation.ja: 連絡を続けろ 了解

translation.en: Look at her cornering. Seems so effortless, doesn't it, sir?
translation.ja: あの なめらかなコーナリング

translation.en: Arm the missile.
The what?
The missile, Bough, the one with the tear gas warhead.
But they're just cyclists, sir. I mean, we'll get past in a minute.
translation.ja: 自転車です　すぐ追い越せる

translation.en: They're French cyclists, Bough, and they're obstructing Her Majesty's Secret Service.
[Bough] Wiper stalk is armed, sir.
[Bough] Sorry.
Terribly sorry. We do apologize.
translation.ja: 謝る　ほんと申し訳ない

translation.en: [English] Stop it, Bough, you'll only encourage them.
-What are we gonna do now, sir? -Patience, Bough.
translation.ja: どうします？ 待つんだ

translation.en: [English] Driving like that, her battery will be dead any moment.
translation.ja: あの走りじゃ電池切れで⸺

translation.en: And she'll roll to a humiliating stop.
translation.ja: 恥ずかしい止まり方をする

translation.en: Bough, it is your job to keep an eye on the fuel gauge.
translation.ja: ボフ　燃料チェックは 君の仕事だぞ

translation.en: Very impressive driving, Mr...
translation.ja: 大した腕ね　名前は…

translation.en: Golightly.
Basil Golightly.
translation.ja: バジル･ゴライトリーだ

translation.en: And you're rather useful yourself, Miss...
translation.ja: 君こそ見事な運転だ 名前は…

translation.en: Bhuletova. Ophelia Bhuletova.

Go!

Good!

translation.ja: そして ようやくチャンスが 訪れたと思ったら⸺

translation.en: The universe sends me you.
translation.ja: 天は あなたを遣わした

translation.en: Well, do you know what I say?
I say, up the universe's arse!
And do you know what else I say? You're fired. With immediate effect. Now, get out!
translation.ja: もう１つ　あなたはクビよ 出てって

translation.en: And make sure I never clap eyes on that imbecile ever again!
translation.ja: 二度と そのバカ面を 見せないで！

translation.en: [Bough] What are you doing, sir?
What do you think I'm doing, Bough? I'm going home.
translation.ja: どこって⸺ 帰るんだ

translation.en: But the Prime Minister is finalizing her deal with Volta.
She's taking him to the G12 Summit in Scotland as her special guest.
It's over, Bough. And there's absolutely nothing we can do about it.
translation.ja: もう終わったんだ どうしようもないさ

translation.en: But, sir... I have a plan.
Remember my wife?
Clear your baffles.
-What? -Mind your head, sir.
[English] This says we're sinking.
She's old and a little rusty, but she can put on a hell of a fireworks display.
translation.ja: 古い艦だけど⸺ ハデなショーは得意よ

translation.en: Excellent work, Commander.
Jeremy has always spoken very highly of you, Agent English.
translation.ja: ジェレミーから お噂(うわさ)は

translation.en: Who?
Oh. Oh, yes. Yes.
I'm no fan of the pen pushers myself,
so when orders came through stationing us here for the Summit, well, I thought a lift was the least I could do.
translation.ja: Ｇ12の警備が任務よ これぐらい任せて

translation.en: Right, let's get a move on, Bough.
Oh. If you wouldn't mind keeping your mobiles off until you're well clear, gentlemen.
translation.ja: 離れるまで携帯はオフに

translation.en: The launch systems on the missiles are a bit 1980s. Gets a tad twitchy around microwave radiation.
translation.ja: うちのは古いミサイルだから 電磁波に過敏なの

translation.en: No problem there, Commander. We're doing this mission old-school.
translation.ja: 心配ご無用 私らもアナログだからね

translation.en: This spot is perfect.
Come on.
Sorry, sir.
Come on, come on...
Right, Bough. Our mission here is simple.
Gain access to Volta's bedroom, and take him out.
translation.ja: 寝室へ侵入し 奴を確保する

translation.en: [Bough] How are you going to get up there, though, sir?
A walk in the park for the exoskeleton.
translation.ja: 楽勝だよ パワードスーツなら

translation.en: Remotely operated neoprene bodysuit.
translation.ja: 遠隔操作式パワードスーツ

translation.en: Increases the wearer's strength 100 times.
translation.ja: これで私もパワー 100倍だ

translation.en: Right, power it up. Stick in the floppy disk and let's go.
translation.ja: フロッピーディスクを入れろ

translation.en: Crikey, sir!
[Jason] When will the weapon be ready?
[Xander] As soon as the Prime Minister signs the agreement, tonight.
translation.ja: 首相が合意書に サインすれば完了

translation.en: [Jason] How do I fire it?
[Xander] Press once, and the attack is launched.
translation.ja: ボタンを押すだけです

translation.en: After which, the data of every G12 country
translation.ja: それでサミット12ヵ国の 全データは⸺

translation.en: will be transferred to the servers onboard the Dot Calm.
translation.ja: ドット･カーム号の サーバーに移行

translation.en: [Jason] Perfect.
Cheers.
You're working for Russian Intelligence and you have been from the start.
translation.ja: 君はロシアのスパイだ

translation.en: Which is why I've taken an antidote to the poison you keep in your ring, and which you've poured into this drink.
translation.ja: だから この毒への 抗毒剤を飲んでおいた

translation.en: And removed the firing pin from that pistol.
Everyone has to make a life for themselves. It's just sad that yours is...
translation.ja: 誰にも人生がある だが悲しいことに君のは⸺

translation.en: over.
Fresh from my 3D printer. Hundred percent plastic.
translation.ja: ３Ｄプリンターの 100％ プラスチック製

translation.en: And 100% deadly.
-Killing me won't save you. -[Jason chuckles]
Don't bet on it.
Seriously, this cannot be happening.
translation.ja: マジか　あり得ない

translation.en: Oh, but it is.
Drop the gun.
Get your hands in the air.
And you.
There's no time for this, Johnny.
Oh, it isn't possible. You cannot be working with this English idiot!
translation.ja: ウソだろ このマヌケとグルなんて

translation.en: Save the pillow talk for your prison cell, Volta.
translation.ja: 愛の言葉は 監獄まで取っておけ

translation.en: -Are you inside, sir? -Yes, yes, Bough, you can power down.
translation.ja: 部屋の中へ？ ああ 出力を下げろ

translation.en: Everything is under control.
-Shut down. -[beeps]
[man] An historic venue for an historic meeting.
The delegates from each G12 member nation will have their own priorities...
translation.ja: 各国には それぞれの 思惑がありますが…

translation.en: How do we get in now, sir?
What's the plan?
[man] Hey, you!
Thank you very much. I hope you have everything you need.
translation.ja: この辺で撮影は終わりに

translation.en: On behalf of the United Kingdom,
translation.ja: 英国を代表して 歓迎いたします

translation.en: may I welcome you here today to this ancient meeting chamber
translation.ja: 英国を代表して 歓迎いたします この会議室は⸺

translation.en: where the great Scottish clans
once settled their differences and forged new alliances.
translation.ja: 中世のスコットランド氏族が 和解した場所です

translation.en: A place I have specifically chosen in order to make a very special announcement.
translation.ja: ここを選んだのは今回 特別な発表をするためです

translation.en: -[English] Oh. Ow. -Sir?
Are you all right, sir?
[English] No, I'm not all right. Get me up, Bough.
translation.ja: ダメだ　起こしてくれ

translation.en: -It's very heavy, sir. -[English] I know how heavy it is, Bough.
translation.ja: 重いです 分かってる

translation.en: We've got to get to the conference--
...to the conference room before Volta--
translation.ja: 急ごう　ヴォルタが…

translation.en: ...before Volta triggers his weapon.
And so, with my signature on this agreement...
translation.ja: では合意書にサインします

translation.en: it gives me great pleasure, oh,
to welcome to you my guest, my friend, Jason Volta.
translation.ja: 我が友 ジェイソン･ ヴォルタをご紹介します

translation.en: [Xander] Standing by to launch attack, Jason.
translation.ja: 作戦準備 完了しました

translation.en: [English] Damn it, get me out of this stuff.
Johnny?
-[Bough] I can't see the join, sir. -[English] It's the clasp.
translation.ja: 方法は？ 留め金を外せば 上下が分かれる

translation.en: [English] Release the clasp, and the top and the bottom separate.
translation.ja: 留め金を外せば 上下が分かれる

translation.en: [Bough] Must have jammed when you fell over, sir.
-For goodness' sake. -Wait. Try this.
That is quite a lot of oil, sir.
Come on! Come on, come on...
translation.ja: 外れろ　外れろ　外れ…

translation.en: Can you imagine what the world would look like if it was run by Apple?
translation.ja: もしアップルが 世界を支配したら？

translation.en: Or Google? Or...
translation.ja: グーグルなら？ あるいは⸺

translation.en: Me?
[Jason] Do you think you'd have failing schools?
Do you think you'd have endless waiting in your hospitals?
translation.ja: 病院で待たされますか？

translation.en: Think you'd have such long lines in your airports?
translation.ja: 空港で長蛇の列に並ぶ？

translation.en: -No. -[Prime Minister] No.
No, because all of these are simple data management problems.
translation.ja: ビッグデータを 巧みに管理するからです

translation.en: And people like me, we love data.
translation.ja: 我々はデータを愛してる

translation.en: We live for data.
translation.ja: データは生き甲斐です

translation.en: Do you know what I live for, Volta?
translation.ja: 私の生き甲斐を知ってるか？

translation.en: Eliminating the threat that lying villains like you pose to this country.
translation.ja: お前のような悪漢から この国を守ることだ

translation.en: Arrest this whack job.
The only person ordering an arrest around here will be me.
translation.ja: 逮捕命令を出せるのは 私だけだ

translation.en: There's no cause for concern, ladies and gentlemen.
You are now in the capable hands of Her Majesty's Secret Service.
translation.ja: 女王陛下のエージェントが お守りします

translation.en: And you, my friend, are in for an uncomfortable ride.
translation.ja: 友よ　お前は⸺ 今から不快なドライブだ

translation.en: Where was I?
Living for data.
Exactly.
My algorithms can solve every one of your problems, as long as I have one thing.
translation.ja: アルゴリズムで問題解決 ただし 渡してもらう

translation.en: Control.
And that is what you are about to give me now.
translation.ja: 今すぐ私に渡すのが条件だ

translation.en: Jason, I wonder if you could just clarify--
Shut up.
-[crowd exclaims, mutters] -Now, hold on.
[Xander] Castle now locked down
and under your control, Jason.
The agreement this ignoramus just signed didn't just give me access to all the UK's data.
translation.ja: 無知な首相のサインで 私は英国の全データを入手

translation.en: It also gave me access to a junction box, in North Ayrshire
translation.ja: 全世界のウェブを束ねる 分配器への⸺

translation.en: that connects the entire World Wide Web.
translation.ja: アクセス権も入手した

translation.en: Disable the fiber-optic cables in that box and the Internet will cease to exist.
translation.ja: 分配器を無効化すれば ネットは⸺ 世界から消える

translation.en: -[English groans] -Johnny? Are you okay?
Have you got a phone? We need to call for backup.
translation.ja: 電話は？ 応援を呼ぶ

translation.en: There's no time for backup. I'm going after Volta.
translation.ja: 時間がないわ　私は奴の所へ

translation.en: And don't lose that one!
Do you understand what it means if I turn the Internet off?
translation.ja: 分かるか？ ネットを切れば どうなる？

translation.en: Cities will go dark. Planes will fall out of the sky.
translation.ja: 街の明かりは消え 飛行機は墜落し⸺

translation.en: Trains will collide. Law and order will break down,
translation.ja: 列車は衝突 治安は乱れ 皆が知ってる世界は終わる

translation.en: and the world as you know it will be over.
translation.ja: 治安は乱れ 皆が知ってる世界は終わる

translation.en: Show, don't tell, right?
translation.ja: 百聞は一見にしかずだ

translation.en: [Xander] Initiating attack, Jason.
Taking control of junction box.
Suspending Internet and electricity supply across Britain and Europe.
translation.ja: 英国と欧州全域の ネットと電力供給を停止

translation.en: -Stage one of attack complete. -[all exclaim]
translation.ja: 攻撃の第一段階 完了

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen. I can stop the attack,
translation.ja: 諸君 攻撃はやめる

translation.en: as long as each of you signs the same agreement as the Prime Minister, -giving me complete control. -[clamoring]
translation.ja: 全員が 首相と同じ合意書に サインをしたらな

translation.en: Your call.
[automated voice] Welcome to British Intelligence.
Get me Pegasus!
[automated voice] For MI5, press one. For MI6, press two.
-[sighs] -For MI7, press three.
[Xander] Eight G12 signatures now acquired.
translation.ja: Ｇ12のうち ８人のサイン取得

translation.en: Signal the chopper, we're almost done here.
translation.ja: ヘリに合図を　ほぼ完了だ

translation.en: [automated voice] For accounts, press five. -For childcare services, press six. -Come on!
translation.ja: 経理部は５番 保育サービスは６番

translation.en: For more options, press seven.
[Xander] Only two further signatures required to achieve control of G12 nations' data.
translation.ja: あと２人のサインで Ｇ12の全データを掌握

translation.en: All UK data -now successfully transferred... -[sighs] ...to the Dot Calm.
translation.ja: 英国のデータは ドット･カーム号へ移行完了

translation.en: [automated voice] For Aphrodite, press one. For Pegasus, press two.
translation.ja: アフロディーテは１番 ペガサスは２番

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Dive the submarine. Repeat, dive the submarine.
translation.ja: 潜水 開始 繰り返す　潜水 開始

translation.en: -Director's office? -This is Johnny English.
translation.ja: 部長室 イングリッシュだ

translation.en: I need to speak to Pegasus immediately.
-It's a national emergency. -[telephone ringing]
One moment, please, sir.
This is HMS Vengeance.
We have a full launch code. Repeat, launch code is locked.
translation.ja: ミサイル発射コードが そろいました

translation.en: Do I have your permission to fire?
Oh, my God. Could you hold on one moment, please?
translation.ja: 大変だわ　お待ちを

translation.en: Sir? Sir!
Hello?
Hello?
Sir! HMS Vengeance here. Do I have your permission to launch?
translation.ja: ミサイルの発射許可を

translation.en: [English] What? Listen, we have to call in an attack.
-[Lydia] Did you say "attack," sir? -Yes, an attack. Attack!
translation.ja: “攻撃”と？ ああ　攻撃だ 攻撃！

translation.en: General quarters, we are go for launch.
translation.ja: 総員配置　ミサイル発射

translation.en: Target coordinates locked, Commander.
Hello?
Hello?
[officer] Commander, the missile is being redirected.
translation.ja: 艦長　標的が変更に

translation.en: It seems to be locking on to a new hostile target.
translation.ja: 新たな標的に向かってます

translation.en: What's a "Sherbet F"?
[Xander] Dot Calm appears to be offline, Jason.
translation.ja: ドット･カーム号が オフラインに

translation.en: The cyber attack has been halted.
translation.ja: 作戦は阻止されました

translation.en: Did you...
make a call quite close to the submarine, sir?
translation.ja: 潜水艦の近くで電話を？

translation.en: You did it, sir!
Mission accomplished!
Well, exactly!
[Xander] I am reevaluating our options, Jason.
translation.ja: 選択肢を再評価中です

translation.en: [Ophelia] Johnny! Johnny!
translation.ja: ジョニー　ジョニー！

translation.en: Volta is getting away! He's heading for his helicopter!
translation.ja: ヴォルタが逃げる　ヘリよ

translation.en: No, Bough.
This one's mine.
Careful, sir. Sir?
Last two steps, sir.
Not so fast, Volta!
translation.ja: そう急ぐな　ヴォルタ

translation.en: Is this supposed to scare me, Sir Lancelot?
translation.ja: その鎧(よろい)は脅しか？

translation.en: [English] Take cover, Bough.
Don't worry, he's only got six bullets in that thing.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ　弾は６発しかない

translation.en: And, of course, the thing itself.
You've run out of options, Volta.
Oh, you think you've won?
[Xander] Rerouting the attack to our Nevada servers, Jason.
translation.ja: ネヴァダに攻撃データ移行

translation.en: The world's going down, English. And I'll be the last man standing.
translation.ja: 世界は終わる 最後に勝つのは私だ

translation.en: Goodbye, English! Goodbye, Internet.
translation.ja: さらば　イングリッシュ ネットもな

translation.en: I've got it! That's a Gazelle 341 light attack helicopter.
translation.ja: あったわ 341ガゼル 軽戦闘ヘリよ

translation.en: If we can hack into its operating system, we can disable the drive function.
translation.ja: 操縦システムを ハッキングできたら止められる

translation.en: Here.
Look at you! You couldn't use that thing if your life depended on it!
translation.ja: この期に及んで それが使えないとはな

translation.en: Let's get outta here.
[Xander] Rerouting complete. Attack data now installed at our Nevada servers.
translation.ja: 移行完了 ネヴァダでの攻撃準備 完了

translation.en: Should I initiate? Jason?
translation.ja: 攻撃開始を？　ジェイソン？

translation.en: Should I initiate the new attack?
Initiate this!
[Xander scrambling] Jason.
[Prime Minister] Well, ladies and gentlemen. I think we can all agree, that wasn't quite the evening we were expecting.
translation.ja: 皆さん　今夜は本当に 予期せぬ展開となりました

translation.en: I had hoped to present to you tonight... -[softly] Thank you. -...a vision of what Britain might be.
translation.ja: 本当は英国の未来を 語りたかったんです

translation.en: But, as it happens, the man who saved us all this evening,
translation.ja: でも今夜 英国を 救った人物は…

translation.en: the man who, I might add, I personally assigned to this case,
translation.ja: 私が任命した彼は 別の未来を⸺

translation.en: has presented us with a different kind of vision.
A living embodiment, if you like, of those fundamental British qualities
translation.ja: 彼こそ 本来の上質な英国を 体現した男

translation.en: that have ensured that our beloved island nation endures.
translation.ja: この愛すべき島国の 本質を現しています

translation.en: Courage under fire, endless ingenuity, and above all, a quiet...
translation.ja: 勇猛さや創意工夫の気性 そして何よりも⸺

translation.en: unassailable dignity.
Thank you.
All together.
Welcome back, Mr. English.
Thank you, Headmaster.
Thank you for agreeing to be our guest speaker. Now, the governors and staff are all waiting for us in the rose garden.
translation.ja: スピーチを頼むよ 知事たちがお待ちだ

translation.en: Yes, if you could just excuse me for a few minutes, Headmaster.
translation.ja: その前に少し よろしいか

translation.en: -Morning, sir! -Hello, sir!
Welcome back, sir!
Surprise!
Thank you.
-Where's Straker? -[Straker grunts]
-Here, sir. -Good.
And, of course, Baggaley.
No, but very good. Very good.
All right, gather round, everyone. Gather round.
I've got some toys to show you.
-[all exclaiming] -There we go.
-Breadstick blowpipe, anyone? -[all] Me!
-Granny Smith hand grenade? -[children] Mine.
translation.ja: リンゴ型手榴弾 私よ

translation.en: -And what about a garroting watch? -Here, sir.
Here, let me take that.
Don't worry, it's only a mild sedative.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　軽い鎮静剤だ

translation.en: Oh! That's just a five-second fuse.
Yes, all right, we all know what garroting looks like.
-[coughs] -Whenever you're ready, Mr. English.
Oh, I'm sorry, Headmaster, I'll just be one moment.
translation.ja: すみません　すぐです

translation.en: [Headmaster] I always did love a jelly baby.
